title: Aceh United F.C.
text:
Aceh United Football Club was an Indonesian <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club based in <a href="Bireu%C3%ABn">Bireuen</a>, <a href="Aceh">Aceh</a>, on the island of <a href="Sumatra">Sumatra</a>.
History.
Aceh United was first formed in the city of <a href="Banda%20Aceh">Banda Aceh</a> in 2010. At first, Aceh United followed the competition <a href="Liga%20Primer%20Indonesia">Liga Primer Indonesia</a>. But because of the league dualism, the club was disbanded and in 2017 they started to rise again.
With <a href="Ansyari%20Lubis">Ansyari Lubis</a> as the coach, they reached 3rd place in the <a href="2017%20Liga%203">2017 Liga 3</a>, and thus, won the promotion to <a href="Liga%202%20%28Indonesia%29">Liga 2</a>. They won the 3rd place after a 2–0 win over <a href="PSAD%20Balikpapan">PSAD Balikpapan</a> on 17 December 2017 at the <a href="Gelora%20Bumi%20Kartini%20Stadium">Gelora Bumi Kartini Stadium</a>, <a href="Jepara">Jepara</a>.
In 2019, the club merged with <a href="PS%20Timah%20BaBel">PS Timah BaBel</a> to form <a href="BaBel%20United%20F.C.">BaBel United</a>.
Jersey and Sponsorships.
Aceh United home jersey is orange with green end-strip, whilst the away jersey is white with orange end-strip. The kit supplier for <a href="2018%20Liga%202">2018</a> season is <a href="Calci">Calci</a>. Other sponsors for 2018 season are: The Light of Aceh and Bank Aceh.
Supporters.
Aceh United have a supporter community called "the Poemeurah". The name is an Acehnese word means <a href="Sumatra">Sumatra</a>n <a href="elephant">elephant</a>. Members of the Poemeurah get free entry ticket at the north tribune of <a href="Harapan%20Bangsa%20Stadium">Harapan Bangsa Stadium</a> for Aceh United home matches.
